name: Plastic Mobile
tag_list: mobile, qr-code, mobile-marketing, app, smartphone-apps, tablet-apps, mobile-commerce, tablet-commerce, sms, mms, mobile-coupons
overview:
Plastic Mobile is a boutique mobile marketing agency working with some of North America’s best brands to expand their presence into the mobile space through innovative, cutting-edge strategies. Plastic Mobile is known for many first-of-their-kind mobile initiatives including launching the first video iPad app in Canada. Recognized for their high client satisfaction, Plastic Mobile designs and delivers mobile applications and websites for all smartphone and tablet platforms to achieve optimal results for their clients and an extraordinary experience for users.

Plastic Mobile designs and delivers mobile applications and websites for all smartphone and tablet platforms. They build strategic mobile solutions such as:

  • Interactive SMS and MMS campaigns
  • Mobile web / WAP sites
  • Native mobile applications (iOS, BlackBerry, QNX, Android, Windows Phone 7, webOS, Symbian)
  • Mobile image recognition using their M2 platform
  • Mobile coupons
  • Mobile commerce
  • Mobile content and downloads
  • Mobile games

Founded in 2007, Plastic Mobile’s rapidly growing client list includes both Canadian and US companies, such as Rogers Media, CBC, AXE, Unilever, Sportsnet, Liberty Science Center, Todayâ€™s Parents, Crispin Porter + Bogusky Canada, and Canadian Business. Visit us at www.plasticmobile.com
